categories: Category:Star Wars: The High Republic (comic series)

nodes.text: The High Republic 8 is the upcoming eighth issue of the comic book series Star Wars: The High Republic. The issue will be written by Cavan Scott, illustrated by Ario Anindito, and published by Marvel Comics on August 11, 2021.
THE BATTLE AGAINST THE DRENGIR REACHES ITS THRILLING CLIMAX!
